function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty stemming from the interdependence of participants in an exchange","Impact":"Potential impact on trust and confidence in service providers","Mitigation":"Improving communication and transparency","Technologies":"Communication tools and data analysis","People":"Customers, service providers","Owner":"Service providers"},{"Description":"Crisis situations can damage a quality relationship","Impact":"Financial and reputational problems for service providers","Mitigation":"Crisis management planning and communication strategies","Technologies":"Crisis management software and communication platforms","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Service providers"},{"Description":"Bank customers are results driven and care about functional quality","Impact":"Determination of customer satisfaction and trust","Mitigation":"Improving product performance and service delivery","Technologies":"Quality control systems and customer feedback tools","People":"Bank customers, service providers","Owner":"Service providers"}]}
